pullRequest.title: JBPM-9138 - RESTWorkItemHandler doesn't support proxy
pullRequest.bodyText:
Creating new constructor with additional useSystemProperties parameter,
which allow creating connection using system properties.
Depends on droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap#1355

nodes.bodyText:
usually if you have a proxy what is the common thing is that everything is affecting by the environment and not really at design time.
You need to ajust this to a system property and read from it. Also would be good if you can set/override the properties like which proxy to use
you have examples here how to do this
https://github.com/kiegroup/droolsjbpm-integration/blob/master/kie-server-parent/kie-server-api/src/main/java/org/kie/server/api/KieServerConstants.java#L39

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -718,24 +717,28 @@ public RESTWorkItemHandler(String username,
                                String password,
                                ClassLoader classLoader,
                                boolean doCacheClient,
-                               int totalPoolConnections,
+                                int totalPoolConnections,

nodes.bodyText: Please rename the method to something like logProtocol so it is obvious that it doesn't print anything on stdout.
